Gilda Gray https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gilda_Gray 0 Gilda Gray (born Marianna Michalska, October 24, 1901 – December 22, 1959) was an American actress and dancer who popularized a dance called the "shimmy" which became fashionable in 1920s films and theater productions. Gilda_Gray ( born Marianna_Michalska , October_24_,_1901 – December_22_,_1959 ) was an_American_actress and dancer who popularized a_dance called the_"_shimmy " which became fashionable in 1920s_films_and_theater_productions .
